review: I loved the Chromecast the whole time it worked. Unfortunately, it just stopped working randomly. The HDMI port gets warped if you leave it plugged in, which you have to do to keep it on. The weight of the charging cord pulls the HDMI port out of the stick, which is probably the reason it no longer works. I hope they fix this in the future. Until then, I'm buying the wireless Roku stick.
